name: Wild Animal Drag Racing
description:
Are you ready to drag race but with wild animals? If so, download the game where you can live in 6 natural habitats and play with each animals in its own habitat. Do you have what it takes to complete all 36 races?

Features Of Wild Animal Racing Game:

- Adventurous race in the form of an animal
- Amazing Level Design
- Superb Soundtrack and Pacing
- Plenty of wildlife to see
- Simple Game Controls.

As of the first release, The game Includes:

-40 Animals

- 36 Races

-36 Playable Animals

-6 Habitats

-6 Chapters + (1 Bonus Level)

So, do you think you are wild enough for this?
